mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pid AS "pid", a.ptel AS "ptel", a.cj_date AS "cjDate", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.station_addr AS "stationAddr", a.create_date AS "createDate"
a.id AS "id", a.pid AS "pid", a.ptel AS "ptel", a.cj_date AS "cjDate", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.station_addr AS "stationAddr", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_fdata( id, pid, ptel, cj_date, of_shizhou, of_quxian, station_addr, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pid}, #{ptel}, #{cjDate}, #{ofShizhou}, #{ofQuxian}, #{stationAddr}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p_fdata SET pid = #{pid}, ptel = #{ptel}, cj_date = #{cjDate}, of_shizhou = #{ofShizhou}, of_quxian = #{ofQuxian}, station_addr = #{stationAddr} WHERE id = #{id}
